testimonial.quoteHtml: She has looked after the children with love which is reciprocated... the children have continued to develop with confidence...
testimonial.author: Sandra D

testimonial.quoteHtml: She has become a friend of the family and I would highly recommend her to anyone who would be lucky enough to meet and choose her.
testimonial.author: Rachele H

testimonial.quoteHtml: Vicky is natural, warm and loving... ...providing healthy home-cooked meals... She understands the individual needs of my sons...
testimonial.author: Tanya C

testimonial.quoteHtml: ...with Vicky, Ruby became gradually but very noticeably more confident and happy as a child.
testimonial.author: Kate T

testimonial.quoteHtml: Vicky is a very confident and capable nanny. She is a trustworthy person who put the most she possibly could into her job.
testimonial.author: Joy W

testimonial.quoteHtml: She is not just brilliant with children but also very empathetic to us as parents.
testimonial.author: Alice P

testimonial.quoteHtml: She has been without doubt an exceptional nanny. I would re-employ her at the drop of a hat.
testimonial.author: Fay R

testimonial.quoteHtml: Vicky is an excellent nanny who has consistently looked after the children with great care and love.
testimonial.author: Catherine S
